original_text: They want to make my people forget who I am. They use their dreams to do this. They tell them to each other. They are as bad as their ancestors. They also forgot who I am when they worshipped the false god, Baal. They want to make my people forget who I am. They use their dreams to do this. They tell them to each other. They are as bad as their ancestors. They also forgot who I am when they worshipped the false god, Baal.
korean_text: 그들이 서로 꿈 꾼 것을 말하니 그 생각인즉 그들의 조상들이 바알로 말미암아 내 이름을 잊어버린 것 같이 내 백성으로 내 이름을 잊게 하려 함이로다

sentences.original_text: They want to make my people forget who I am.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내 백성이 내가 누구인지 잊게 하려고 한다.

sentences.original_text: They use their dreams to do this.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이것을 하기 위해 그들의 꿈을 사용한다.

sentences.original_text: They tell them to each other.
They are as bad as their ancestors.
They also forgot who I am
when they worshipped the false god, Baal.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 거짓 신 바알을 숭배할 때.

sentences.original_text: They want to make my people forget who I am.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내 백성이 내가 누구인지 잊게 하려고 한다.

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이것을 하기 위해 그들의 꿈을 사용한다.

sentences.original_text: They tell them to each other.
They are as bad as their ancestors.
They also forgot who I am
when they worshipped the false god, Baal.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 거짓 신 바알을 숭배할 때.
